item.title: Setup Vue With Tailwind
item.description: You are walking in the beautifiul winter sun and suddenly you come up with an idea for a web application you want to build. Where to start? I use VueJS with Tailwind to quickly setup a draft project. This post guides you through this process. I expect you to have node installed and npm as well. First of all, we want to initialize the VueJS project. Vue offers a CLI tool to do this.

item.title: Who is Martin?
item.description: Hi there, I am Martin. I am a 25 year old software engineer living in The Netherlands. My main interest are in languages like Go, Rust and Kotlin. I work for Albert Heijn, one of the biggest retailers in The Netherlands.
